Three Tier Serverless Architecture

Scalable AWS Cloud Solution

Architecture Overview

Designed and deployed a scalable, serverless three-tier AWS architecture featuring presentation, application, and data layers with comprehensive monitoring and CDN optimization.

AWS Services

Compute
EC2, Lambda
Storage
S3, RDS
Network
VPC, CloudFront
Monitoring
EFK Stack

Architecture Tiers

Tier 1
Presentation Layer
CloudFront CDN for global content delivery and S3 static hosting
CloudFront S3
Tier 2
Application Layer
Serverless compute with Lambda functions and EC2 instances
Lambda EC2
Tier 3
Data Layer
Managed database services with automated backups
RDS S3

Key Features & Benefits

Auto-Scaling & High Availability

Serverless architecture automatically scales based on demand with 99.9% uptime guarantee.

Comprehensive Monitoring

EFK stack implementation for real-time logging, monitoring, and alerting across all services.

Security & Compliance

VPC isolation, IAM roles, and encryption at rest and in transit for enterprise-grade security.
